column5: The Master of Accounting programme at HKU Business School offers three streams and allows students the option to choose according to their interests and career aspirations. Students may choose to concentrate on one of three streams: 1) Accounting Analytics and FinTech; 2) Financial Reporting and Valuation; and 3) Managerial Decision Making and Corporate Governance. They may also consider double concentrating if there are any two they are particularly passionate about. Our comprehensive curriculum is accredited by the ACCA, CPA Australia, CIMA and HKICPA, and students on this programme benefit from our professional partnership with the ACCA and KPMG.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
